title: Smart Data Models - Noise Pollution Forecast
description: Noise Pollution forecast stores the expectation about noise pollution based on some input elements and the noise elements present.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. it has to be NoisePollutionForecast

noiseAnnoyanceIndex.description: Property. Index (1 to 10) according to noise annoyance level

LANight.description: Property. Average sound level recorded during the night (8h)

LAmax2.description: Property. Maximum sound level recorded for the last 2 hours

LAeq2.description: Property. Average sound level over the last 2 hours

noiseOrigin.description: Property. Main origin (source) of the recorded noise at installation of the sensor

LAeq.description: Property. Average sound level (equivalent) recorded during the measuring time

LAeq_d.description: Property. Average sound level during the day (8h)

LAmax.description: Property. Maximum sound level recorded during the measuring time

validFrom.description: Property. The start of the validity period for this forecast as a ISO8601 format

validTo.description: Property. The end of the validity period for this forecast as a ISO8601 format

validity.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Includes the validity period for this forecast as a ISO8601 time interval.

dateIssued.description: Property. The date and time the forecast was issued by the service provider in ISO8601 UTC format.
